00047 #define VACANT (-1)

00050 enum comm_state
00051 {
00052   CLOSED = 0, 
00053   WAIT_SERVER_CLIENT_SYNC, 
00054   WAIT_SERVER_CLIENT_RESP_ACK, 
00058   WAIT_CLIENT_SERVER_SYNC, 
00059   WAIT_CLIENT_SERVER_DATA, 
00060   WAIT_RESET, 
00061 };
00062 
00064 struct client_record
00065 {
00066   int32_t id; 
00067   struct sockaddr_in client_addr; 
00068   enum comm_state state; 
00069   void *data; 
00073   size_t len; 
00074 }; 
00075 
00077 struct client_db
00078 {
00079   size_t len; 
00080   struct client_record *recs; 
00081   sqlite3 *todo_db; 
00082 };
